keyMoments.title: Hannyabal's Debut
keyMoments.description: Hannyabal makes his first appearance as Vice Warden of Impel Down, greeting Vice Admiral Momonga and Warlord Boa Hancock at the prison entrance. He is informed about Buggy's escape from Level 1.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Hannyabal as a key character in the Impel Down hierarchy with transparent ambitions to become the Warden.
keyMoments.quote: Welcome to Impel Down, Vice Admiral Momonga and Warlord Boa Hancock!

relationships.description: Hannyabal serves under Chief Warden Magellan but openly desires to take his position.
Works alongside Domino in managing Impel Down's operations.

keyMoments.title: Domino's Debut
keyMoments.description: Domino makes her first appearance as Chief Guard of Impel Down. She is tasked with conducting the mandatory full-body search of Boa Hancock.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Domino as a key security officer and establishes the strict protocols of Impel Down.
keyMoments.quote: Standard procedure for all Devil Fruit users. Please wear these Seastone handcuffs.

relationships.description: Works alongside Hannyabal in managing Impel Down's security and operations.
Conducts security search of Hancock following standard protocols.

keyMoments.title: Minotaurus Suppresses Prison Riot
keyMoments.description: The Minotaurus, a massive bipedal cow wielding a spiked mace, appears to suppress a prisoner riot on Level 1, demonstrating overwhelming power.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the Jailer Beasts as formidable guardians of Impel Down, establishing the prison's monstrous security measures.

abilities.description: The Minotaurus possesses an awakened Zoan-type Devil Fruit, giving it enhanced strength, durability, and recovery abilities.
Wields a massive spiked mace to subdue prisoners with devastating force.

reveals.information: One of the Jailer Beasts guarding Impel Down
Possesses awakened Zoan-type Devil Fruit powers

name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Garp and Ace Discuss Their Criminal Heritage
keyMoments.description: Ace reveals to Garp that both he and Luffy carry the blood of a world-class criminal, hinting at his true parentage. He affirms Whitebeard as his only father.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows the major revelation of Ace's parentage as the son of Gol D. Roger and establishes his chosen family over blood family.
keyMoments.quote: You both have the blood of a world-class criminal. You could never be Marines.

keyMoments.title: Ace Took His Mother's Surname
keyMoments.description: Ace explains that he took his mother's name 'Portgas' out of love and respect for her sacrifice, rejecting his biological father's legacy.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Ace's deep emotional connection to his mother and his rejection of his biological father.
keyMoments.quote: I took my mother's name 'Portgas' because I owe her everything. I don't care about my father.

relationships.description: Ace is Garp's grandson. Despite their opposing sides, Garp loves Ace and is conflicted about his impending execution.

evolutionMoments.description: Garp visits Ace in his cell, expressing disappointment that Ace chose piracy over becoming a Marine.

relationships.description: Ace considers Whitebeard his true father, rejecting his biological father's legacy.

evolutionMoments.description: Ace affirms to Garp that Whitebeard is his only father.

reveals.information: Hints that he carries the blood of a world-class criminal
Took his mother's surname 'Portgas' out of love for her
Considers Whitebeard his only true father

keyMoments.title: Luffy Arrives at Impel Down
keyMoments.description: Luffy arrives at Impel Down hidden beneath Boa Hancock's cloak, beginning his infiltration of the world's most secure prison with only 33 hours until Ace's execution.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Luffy's boldest rescue mission and demonstrates his determination to save his brother regardless of the danger.

relationships.description: Hancock uses her Warlord status to smuggle Luffy into Impel Down, demonstrating her deep commitment to helping him.

evolutionMoments.description: Hancock smuggles Luffy into Impel Down beneath her cloak and endures security searches to protect him.

keyMoments.title: Hancock Arrives at Impel Down with Luffy
keyMoments.description: Hancock arrives at Impel Down using her Warlord privileges, smuggling Luffy beneath her cloak to help him rescue Ace.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Hancock's willingness to risk her position and reputation to help Luffy, showing the depth of her feelings for him.

keyMoments.title: Hancock Submits to Security Protocol
keyMoments.description: Hancock is placed in Seastone handcuffs and must undergo a full-body search while hiding Luffy, demonstrating the strict security of Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even a Warlord must submit to Impel Down's protocols, and demonstrates Hancock's composure under pressure.

relationships.description: Hancock risks her position as a Warlord to help Luffy infiltrate Impel Down and rescue Ace.

evolutionMoments.description: Hancock smuggles Luffy into Impel Down and endures security checks to protect him.

keyMoments.title: Buggy Escapes from Level 1
keyMoments.description: Buggy successfully escapes from his cell on Level 1 using his Bara Bara no Mi powers, setting up his role in the Impel Down chaos.
keyMoments.significance: Reintroduces Buggy as a wildcard character and demonstrates his unique suitability for prison escape.

reveals.information: Has been captured and imprisoned in Impel Down
